reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 120/21: MONEY PAID OR PERSONAL PROPERTY DELIVERED TO CHILD IF NO GUARDIAN (SECTION 51 OF THE ACT)
reg_info.reg_name_text: MONEY PAID OR PERSONAL PROPERTY DELIVERED TO CHILD IF NO GUARDIAN (SECTION 51 OF THE ACT)

content.content: 1. For the purpose of subsection 51 (1.1) of the Act, the prescribed amount is $35,000.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purpose of subsection 51 (1.1) of the Act, the prescribed amount is $35,000.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
